53 456 388 71 117 114 65 372 302 391 560 736 236 200 216 150 118 91 144 100 124 49 73 844 773 938 1,092 907 477 363 354 776 4,421 1,886 7,083 611 3,908 3,013 7,532 700 532 849 2,081 2,087 8,861 5,748 16,696   ## p. 618 (#642) ############################################  Appendix 8 Aircraft in all Theaters against Germany June 1942 to August 1945 1942 1943 Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec Jan Combat Airplanes 1st Line 17 369 567 613 1,060 1,426 1,744 1,905 2nd Line 9 24 25 25 29 32 36 30 Total 26 393 592 638 1,089 1,458 1,780 1,935 Heavy Bombers 1st Line 17 B-17 B-24 17 2nd Line Total 17 8288 86 160 241 361 368 368 413 54 114 155 245 244 246 293 32 46 86 116 124 122 120 1 1 1 1 1 1 86 161 242 362 369 369 414 Medium Bombers 1st Line B-25 B-26 2nd Line Total Light Bombers 1st Line A-20 A-26 2nd Line Total Fighters 1st Line 550 56 55 1 50 56 ទី៣ នទី 105 116 179 212 92 104 125 24 75 87 105 116 179 212 2224 2242 199 9 99 1 2333423 18 33 40 18 33 40 1 24 23 19 42 56 59 4458 43 43 15 58 P-38 P-39 P-40 P-47 283 355 294 556 884 1,058 1,117 80 131 133 184 253 302 293 ' 177 251 210 177 44 60 59 72 190 259 366 1 1 88 120 P-51 Night Fighters Other 159 164 102 123 190 199 161 283 355 294 556 884 1,058 1,117 2nd Line Total Reconnaissance 1st Line F-4, F-5 22 F-6 1 F-7 F-8 Other 2nd Line 1 1 1 13 20 20 13 20 22223 25 21 338 99 120 36 2300 4 63 77 4 8 16 14 Total 2 13 24 33 115 134 Grand Total* 26 445 692 762 1,286 1,690 2,065 2,245 *Includes other aircraft not shown (transports, trainers, and communications aircraft.)   ## p. 619 (#643) ############################################  1943 Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec 2,416 2,888 3,682 4,522 5,107 5,283 5,277 5,371 5,371 5,532 6,273 7,003 29 30 50 74 105 120 133 166 184 198 235 2,445 2,918 3,732 4,596 5,212 5,403 5,410 5,537 5,537 5,716 5,716 6,471 7,238 462 557 891 1,028 1,295 1,388 1,348 1,448 1,520 843 2,167 328 396 697 828 1,052 1,134 1,124 1,148 1,205 1,205 1,434 1,591 134 161 194 200 243 254 224 300 315 409 576 1 1 1 1
